question: What service does enstant.com provide?
answer: enstant.com provides a web-based business card management solution to growing and established companies looking for quality, consistency and speed. enstant.com provides a quicker, easier and smarter method of requesting, proofing, managing and tracking corporate business cards online.

question: How does enstant.com do this?
answer: enstant .com sets up a password-protected website with your company's business card specifications (i.e., logo, font, style, layout, and ink colors) preformatted to ensure consistency for all your orders. enstant.com allows you to place orders, proof for typos instantly, manage and track up-to-the-minute shipping status and order history from any computer connected to the internet at any time!

question: How does this benefit me - the end user?
answer: enstant.com's On-Line Tool reduces time and stress traditionally associated with ordering business cards by speeding up ordering and proofing processes via your own customized web site. After entering the data such as name, title, etc. for your order, you can instantly preview electronic artwork of how the card will actually look. This eliminates the traditional paper and fax proofing cycles and prevents errors. Also, all your orders are archived so when you need to reorder them next time, just search for your previous order, update new info and submit order for printing. This speeds up ordering process by eliminating redundant data entry! The archived database also allows you to check order and shipping history.This eliminates playing "phone tag" with your printer and gives you total control in managing your orders!

question: How does this benefit my department and company?
answer: enstant.com On-line Tool archives and saves all orders. Information such as number of orders, shipping logs and order history are readily available on-line any time. Department heads and purchasing agents can check and create reports on the number and cost of business cards ordered in a given time period. This helps in budgeting and cost evaluations for each department in your company.

question: How long does it take to get my cards?
answer:
enstant.com will deliver or ship your cards within 3 working days after your order is authorized for printing. 
 All printing is done in our in-house advanced printing department using printing presses and other various equipment optimized for speed and consistent quality, time after time.

question: What type of business cards can enstant.com produce?
answer:
We can produce business cards, exactly to your Corporate Identity Guideline.
 We can print in any of thousands of Pantoneâ„¢ color or in full color process inks.
 We can print on any paper specified.
 We can print in any font specified.
 We can print high resolution screens and detailed images.
 We can do foil stamping, embossing and diecutting.

question: Can enstant.com print business cards in foreign language?
answer: Yes, enstant.com can translate, typeset and print your business cards in foreign language.

question: Which companies will enstant.com definitely benefit?
answer: enstant.com On-Line Tool will benefit companies that order business cards frequently. These include companies with a large number of employees or agents, those with multiple branch offices or those experiencing a period of rapid growth. Hi-tech, financial, and hospitality companies are just a few examples of the companies that will benefit from enstant.com On-line Tool.

question: How do I get started?
answer: Click the Get Started button and fill up the form. We will get you back as soon as possible.
